name: Edventure More
description: Our mission is to create equitable high-quality STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, and Mathematics) and SEL (Social Emotional Learning) youth programs that cultivate curiosity, courage, and kindness. We help children and young adults develop intellectual capacities and character traits that are predictive of high achievement and life satisfaction. In the past five years, we intensified efforts to partner with under-performing schools and under-resourced communities across Northern Cal
